name: Purugly
description: The Tiger Cat Pokémon. It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon’s nest and claims it as its own.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes half the damage it otherwise would from Ice and Fire damage.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming confused.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is suffering from a negative status effect or stat change imposed by an opponent, it gains +2 to all attack rolls.
